comments: This by far the worst professor I had since elementary school. He talks about his FT article for 80% of the class and then about the book. He makes students useless. You are never right when participating so you are better off not participating at all. you can learn everything from class by just watching msnbc. I would not recommend this prof.

I am learning more in this class than I ever expected. Anyone can teach from a textbook, but few people have his range of information and experience. He expects you to show up and participate, but the effort is well worth it.

the worst professor in Business department, dosnt curve, makes students feel dumb for asking questions, and dose not accept anything 10 mins late, lectures have nothing to do with exams, and teaching style is terrible, he knows what hes talking about but dosnt do a good job at teaching such things to the students, he is a new professor,not recomend
